direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve adding elements to the collection, with addAll internally calling add for each element.
Both methods modify the collection and involve similar control flows, such as updating the index.
Both methods involve modifying the collection by adding or removing multiple elements, with removeAll internally calling remove for each element.
Both methods involve conditional modification of the collection, with removeIf potentially removing elements based on a predicate.
Both methods involve modifying the collection by adding or retaining elements based on a condition.
Both methods involve clearing or modifying the collection, with clear removing all elements and resetting the index.
Both methods depend on the index, with reindex rebuilding the index after modifications.
